p: Results: A total of 22 blood samples and CVC tips were tested. The Biofire kit and the RT-PCR identified as positive 75 % of positive CVC cultures.The Biofire kit failed to identify positive blood samples.The RT-PCR identified 66 % of them. The Biofire kit did not identify false positive samples. The RT-PCR had a false positive rate of 35 % of negative CVC tips and 67 % of negative blood samples. Blood for standard cultures was drawn prior to antibiotics in 41 % of patients, but almost all patients received antibiotics before blood was drawn for PCR. CVC line tip vortex fluid cultures showed excellent concordance with standard tip cultures.
